DAO

Class DAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.DAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of object
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnswerDAO, CommentDAO, PollDAO, UserAnswerDAO, UserDAO

    public abstract class DAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object : Provides 4 functions according to the CRUD pattern.
    Author:
    Max Cabourg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DAO()
      Intializates the database.
